Name: Male head
Description: This small head is probably a cast. The facial features are very marked: the eyebrows are deep, just as the eyes which have been elongated to the temples with the help of a thick engraved line. The nose is quite big. The mouth, by contrast, has not been developed: only a minimal part of the upper lip is visible. The ears are totally missing. On the front, one can see a band executed in low relief.
